topic.title: Bitcoin Address
topic.body: OK so I have my new zeronet, ID, email etc and website with site address and identifier address and can make donations. Who has the real control of all BTC addresses being used here ? So as money flows, who really has full acces ?

1557395222_17RgJMZ9wxBZvSyTFnSGkMQVpLrAG.body: OK thank you ! I will start diggin around and learning more. thanks for the nudge in the right direction

1557421253_191qyhaRxXEx1bdtG65iQvFddtXBj.body: Hmmm, seems more to be done, to make zeronet what it can really be. interesting and great work

1557356335_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92T.body: what would happen if something similar was hosting here ?
